pullrequest.title: [Citadel] [WIP] Add support for sdformat frame semantics

content.raw: I would agree with this. For sdf files, the 1.6 -> 1.7 converter takes care of setting `xyz_expressed_in` attribute so removing `use_parent_model_frame` from the spec seems okay to me. For msgs, however, removing the field breaks API. I like @{557058:6ff86fcb-b7ab-44a5-b8a6-f6d9cae8b6e8}'s approach, but `xyz_expressed_in.empty()` is a valid value. Should we use `StringValue` instead to make it nullable?
content.html: I would agree with this. For sdf files, the 1.6 -> 1.7 converter takes care of setting xyz_expressed_in attribute so removing use_parent_model_frame from the spec seems okay to me. For msgs, however, removing the field breaks API. I like @Louise Poubel's approach, but xyz_expressed_in.empty() is a valid value. Should we use StringValue instead to make it nullable?
